comments_0.comment_text:

 We are removing these old tutorials from website. You can find them here: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/dmlc/mxnet/tree/master/example/rnn/old>https://github.com/dmlc/mxnet/tree/master/example/rnn/old</denchmark-link>

comments_3.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/orgs/apache/teams/mxnet-committers>@apache/mxnet-committers</denchmark-link>
 : This issue has been inactive for the past 90 days. It has no label and needs triage.
